description: This file defines the AIProvider class which manages AI-related interactions within a Flutter application. It provides methods for asking questions about stock symbols using a mock service, maintains loading state, and notifies listeners of state changes.

classes.name: AIProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that handles AI question-answering logic and state management for a Flutter app.

methods.name: AIProvider
methods.description: Constructor initializing AIProvider with a mock services instance.

methods.name: ask
methods.description: Asynchronously sends a question about a stock symbol to the mock AI service and updates the last answer.

methods.name: _setLoading
methods.description: Private method to update loading state and notify listeners.
